# Class GoalAdvancementData

Represents a goal advancement.

##### Index

### Methods

destroy getGoals

## Methods

### destroy

  * destroy(): void

Cleans up resources associated with this data.

#### Returns void

Inherited from BaseData.destroy




### getGoals

  * getGoals(): [GoalAdvancementInterface](/interfaces/common_data_types_external_goal_advancement_data.GoalAdvancementInterface)

Retrieves the goals.

#### Returns [GoalAdvancementInterface](/interfaces/common_data_types_external_goal_advancement_data.GoalAdvancementInterface)

An array of goal advancement, or undefined if no goal advancement is found
